summary: This mod adds Malacoda to Skyrim, where he can be found at Candlehearth Hall in Windhelm. He is marriageable, can be a housecarl or steward and has a unique voice (RDO required) or standalone (male eventoned) voice.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Malacoda the Corsair

[/size][/color][/font][size=4][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]This mod introduces Malacoda, a Redguard corsair to Skyrim. You can find him at Candlehearth in Windhelm. He comes wielding two akaviri katanas, and prisoner rags (so that you can make him wear whatever armor you like). Malacoda uses a combination of dual-wielding/one-handed skills in combat and has healing and alteration spells (ironflesh, etc). His perks are mixed between one-handed & stealth skills to make him a competent rogue. 

[/color][/font][/size][i][size=4]1.2 UPDATE Malacoda now has a completely standalone version with a different voice(asides from the requisite DLC), and this files are now conveniently packaged into .bsa format. Ran through Tes5Edit and playtested! Original version still requires 'Relationship Dialogue Overhaul'.[/size][/i][size=4][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]


[/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work.

[b][u]*NOTE[/u][/b]: [i]I am using facelight in the save these pics were taken from, so if Malacoda looks like he 'may' have gray face in the pics it's just the lighting difference from the Facelight spell. [/i][/color][/font][/size]
[font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Marriageable (Non-RDO only)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Housecarl for Hearthfires [/size][/color][/font][size=4]([font=Times New Roman]Non-RDO only)[/font][/size]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Steward for Hearthfires [/size][/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4](Non-RDO only)[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Unique Voice (MaleSoldier/Gideon Emery)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Unique weapons & armor with enchantments[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Unique Summon "Bruin" spell [/size][/color][/font]
[/list]


[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Big thanks goes to [/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]Kalilies [/url]﻿& Stealthic for KS Hairdo's Renewal[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]LogRaam[/url]﻿ for The Eyes of Beauty [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/]Cloudedtruth[/url]﻿ for Relationship Dialogue Overhaul [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37999/]530gothic25[/url]﻿ for allowing me to use the 'Short Face bear' assets for my Bruin summon[/size][/color][/font]
[/list]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Armors & Weapons featured in Screencaps (not included in mod) [/size][/color][/font]

None of the armors pictured (besides the Dawnguard armor) appear in this file, you will have to download them from their respective author(s). 

[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52502/]Reclamations Morrowind Style[/url]﻿ (Mephala 'Webspinner' armor) by Sabbath6100
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53501/?]Heavenly She-Wolf[/url]﻿ by Maibatsu (Currently hidden) 
[*]Final Fantasy Tactics Balthier Armor by Nghệ Sĩ Ưu Tú (Search for their blog, not sure if I can post links to these types of mods/sites on here)
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang

files.name: Malacoda Standalone
files.changelogHtml:
Changed Malacdoa's voice for standalone version
Gave Malacoda unique armor & weapons
